name: Gunk Shot
description: You fire a wad of icky gunk at a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing 1d10 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 16 or higher, the target is poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 3d8 at level 5, 4d10 at level 10, and 7d8 at level 17.
